author: luc
msg: This is a great step forward for Nabla as it allows to differentiate
The basic structure is there but binding several instances together is
not done, so for now invocation will work only when the other methods
are called on the same instance of the same class.

author: luc
msg: Use a normal base class instead of creating boilerplate code manually.
The fact the differentiated class will now extend a base class provided
by Nabla implies there will remain a dependence to Nabla at runtime,
even if we set up class persistance and save the classes in a jar. So
the base class NablaDifferentiated should probably be packaged
separately with maven as a nabla-runtime jar (which will contain only

author: tgraves
msg: HDFS-3905. Secure cluster cannot use hftp to an insecure cluster (Daryn Sharp via tgraves)
